item.title: Meme Coin Ani Market Cap Surges Above $63 Million, 24-hour Gain 58.22%
item.description: On July 22nd, based on the GMGN market data, the market capitalization of the Grok humanoid companion concept Meme coin Ani surged above $63 million. It achieved a 24-hour gain of 58.22% and a 24-hour trading volume of $23.6 million.BlockBeats reminds users that many Meme coins lack practical use cases and have high price volatility. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: WXT peaked at 0.3751, reaching an all-time high, entering the holding group to receive a $20 WXT airdrop.
item.description: On July 22nd, the token of the WEEX platform, WEEX Token (WXT), has reached a series of all-time highs in the past two days. On this day, it reached a peak of 0.3751 US dollars, which is a 275% increase from its listing price a year ago.According to an announcement in the official community group of WXT holders, starting from today until July 31st, the first 50 new members (holding at least 688 WXT) will each receive a $20 worth of WXT airdrop, and the total prize pool is $1,000.

item.title: A-share Stablecoin Concept Stock Dongxin Trust Soared to Daily Limit Today
item.description: On July 22nd, based on market information, the A-share stablecoin concept stock Dongxin Hesheng witnessed a daily limit up, and today's trading volume reached 5.88 billion US dollars.BlockBeats previously reported that Conflux Network has reached a strategic cooperation with AnchorX and Dongxin Hesheng, aiming to jointly promote the landing of offshore RMB stablecoin issuance, cross-border settlement, RWA, and other application scenarios in countries participating in the "Belt and Road" initiative. The three parties plan to participate in pilot projects in Central Asia, Southeast Asia, and other regions.

item.title: Trump's Son Responds to Criticism: ETH Up 35% in 5 Months, Should Embrace Volatility and Buy the Dip
item.description: On July 22nd, Eric Trump, the son of former President Donald Trump, responded on social media to a comment that "ETH dropped by approximately 40% after his tweet on February 4th announcing an ETH purchase." Eric Trump said, "ETH has increased by 35% in 5 months. Embrace the volatility. If you are smart, you should buy when the price dips just like I said."Earlier reports showed that since Eric Trump's "ETH purchase" tweet on March 31st, the price of ETH fell from around $2,880 to $1,820, representing a decline of about 40%.

item.title: The Swedish company Fragbite Group has purchased approximately 4.3 BTC, initiating the establishment of a Bitcoin treasury.
item.description: On July 22nd, as per NLNico's monitoring, the Swedish company Fragbite Group completed its first purchase of approximately 4.3 bitcoins. It began to build a Bitcoin treasury, with an average price of approximately $112,958 per bitcoin.Fragbite Group stated that the aim is to invest the remaining liquidity for the long term and continue to accumulate Bitcoin in order to enhance the company's capital structure.

item.title: DWF Partner: The Cryptocurrency Season of Shitcoins Has Just Begun
item.description: On July 22nd, Andrei Grachev, the managing partner of DWF Labs, tweeted, "The altcoin season of cryptocurrency has just commenced, and Nasdaq-listed companies are also on the verge of ushering in the alt season."

item.title: Binance Wallet: Users with no less than 225 Alpha Points can participate in the Delphinus Lab TGE Event
item.description: July 22nd, Binance Wallet tweeted that users with no fewer than 225 Alpha Points can participate in the Delphinus Lab TGE event through the Alpha Activity Page. Participating in this event will subtract 15 points.Subscription Time: July 22nd, 2025, from 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM (UTC+8)

item.title: Capital B to Raise Approximately â‚¬10.3 Million to Advance Bitcoin Treasury Strategy
item.description: On July 22nd, the European publicly listed company Capital B (formerly known as The Blockchain Group) announced an increase in capital of approximately 10.3 million euros in order to advance its Bitcoin treasury company strategy.

item.title: BNB Chain Foundation Acquires $25,000 TAG Token
item.description: On July 22nd, the BNB Chain officially announced that it had swapped 25,000 USDT for 40,421,479.45 TAG at a swap price of $0.0006184830526. This acquisition is a part of the BNB Chain's $100 million incentive plan, with the aim of supporting high-quality projects and promoting the continuous development of the ecosystem.

item.title: Ether Machine CEO: "The Genius Act's Biggest Beneficiary Is Ethereum"
item.description: On July 22nd, as reported by Cointelegraph, Andrew Keys, the CEO of Ether Machine, stated: "The Ethereum is the biggest beneficiary of the 'GENIUS Act'."
